analysis.translation: In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.
analysis.context: This verse emphasizes the importance of beginning any task with the name of Allah.

analysis.translation: Allah! There is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence.
analysis.context: This verse highlights the oneness of Allah and His eternal nature.

analysis.translation: Allah! There is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence.
analysis.context: This verse reaffirms the concept of Tawhid (the oneness of God).

analysis.translation: Worship Allah and associate nothing with Him, and to parents, do good, and to relatives, orphans, the needy, the near neighbor, the neighbor farther away, the companion at your side, the companion along the way, and those whom your right hand possesses.
analysis.context: This verse emphasizes the importance of worship and good conduct towards others.
